script.name: Lib.Gen.Anarkis.ADS.Get.SectorThreat
script.description: ADS - Lib : Get threat level of a sector

line.comment: * LU Update (Solarahawk): upgraded merge arrays code to join arrays comand

line.text: '%sRace %s is searching for sector threat in %s, at a range of %s km.'

line.comment: * Get all race owned objects from sector, merge arrays
* Check, if there are some enemy ships in given range of THIS
* Check all enemy objects for given criteria; only objects meeting all criterias are registered and taken into account for sectorthreat evaluation
* Remove any ship of neutral or unknown race

line.text: '%s%s is removed because it is of race: %s'

line.comment: * Ignore list - do not choose ships belonging to any race listed in the ignore list

line.text: '%s%s is removed because its owner race is being ignored.'
'%s%s is removed because it is a civilian ship.'
'%s%s is removed because it is not a foe.'

line.comment: * Range check, if a range is given, only take ships into account, which are within range of THIS

line.text: '%sDistance to enemy ship %s: %s km Ship threat: %s Overall threat: %s'

sval.val: ADS - Lib : Get threat level of a sector
Get.sectorthreat
%sRace %s is searching for sector threat in %s, at a range of %s km.
%s%s is removed because it is of race: %s
%s%s is removed because its owner race is being ignored.
%s%s is removed because it is a civilian ship.
%s%s is removed because it is not a foe.
%sDistance to enemy ship %s: %s km Ship threat: %s Overall threat: %s
LU Update (Solarahawk): upgraded merge arrays code to join arrays comand
Get all race owned objects from sector, merge arrays
Check, if there are some enemy ships in given range of THIS
Check all enemy objects for given criteria; only objects meeting all criterias are registered and taken into account for sectorthreat evaluation
Remove any ship of neutral or unknown race
$owner = $enemy.object-> get owner race
Ignore list - do not choose ships belonging to any race listed in the ignore list
Remove civillian ships
Ship already registered
Remove non foe ships
$relation = $enemy.object-> get relation to race $race
if not [THIS] -> is $enemy.object a enemy
Range check, if a range is given, only take ships into account, which are within range of THIS
